name: Simon Saves Christmas 2!
description:
Slimeface Studios is back with another episode in the epic Simone Saves Christmas two-parter.

Honeydew is being sent into the houses he was running on top of last year, and he still hasn't learned how to stop running.

Avoid home-owners asking you with a baseball-bat to the mush what you're doin' in their house, as you try and make right the wrongs made merely hours earlier.

Made with Construct 2 Personal.

"Slimeface Studios" is literally just me lmao.

- Important Gameplay Information -

  • Home-owners spawn from the brown doors when the bar on the right fills up
  • Home-owners are completely safe to walk over when incapacitated
  • Arrow-keys to move
  • Releasing the arrow-keys won't stop Simon from running
  • The icon and number in the bottom left indicate how many toys you have
  • There are 5 levels
  • The fifth level is really hard lol (but absolutely possible)
